spec_data.Name: thunderbird-enigmail
spec_data.Description:
Enigmail is an extension to the mail client Mozilla Thunderbird
which allows users to access the authentication and encryption
features provided by GnuPG
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 04 Oct 2017 07:50:53 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Authentication and encryption extension for Mozilla Thunderbird
